paper_abstract: Purpose - This paper sets out to present the weight optimization of sampling drill-bits which is designed for European Space Agency - Beagle 2 Mars Express mission. Design/methodology/approach - In this study, two techniques, finite element analysis and numerical optimization, are employed to find out the optimal solution within the various constraints. Findings - The result shows that the total weight of sampling drill-bits was reduced over 76.7 percent. Originality/value - The proposed methodology can also be applied in different engineering design applications and provides a total integrated solution as a generic template for design engineers.
paper_title: Weight optimization of sampling instruments for ESA Mars Express Mission
